Package: com.bestbuy.sdk.api

[Groovy] Class BestBuyClient

    • com.bestbuy.sdk.api.BestBuyClient

    • BestBuy API Client, gives access to all the operations available in API definition
      You can find complete Best Buy API documentation here
      Uses @Log4j to log events

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.String  API_KEY

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          BestBuyClient (java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String baseUrl = ClientConfiguration.baseUrl, java.lang.String betaBaseUrl = ClientConfiguration.baseBetaUrl)
          Constructor accepting API key, and URLs to use
          You can check URLs in Best Buy API Documentation here
          BestBuyClient ()
          Default constructor, will use a system variable to load your API key (BBY_API_KEY)
          URLs used will be set by default in constructor BestBuyClient(String, String, String)
          You can check URLs in Best Buy API Documentation here

        • java.lang.String API_KEY

      • Constructor Detail

        • BestBuyClient(java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String baseUrl = ClientConfiguration.baseUrl, java.lang.String betaBaseUrl = ClientConfiguration.baseBetaUrl)

          Constructor accepting API key, and URLs to use
          You can check URLs in Best Buy API Documentation here

          params:
          apiKey The API key
          params:
          baseUrl API base URL for API v1 endpoints. By default 'http://api.remix.bestbuy.com/v1/' will be used
          params:
          betaBaseUrl API base URL for API BETA endpoints. By default 'http://api.bestbuy.com/beta/' will be used

        • BestBuyClient()

          Default constructor, will use a system variable to load your API key (BBY_API_KEY)
          URLs used will be set by default in constructor BestBuyClient(String, String, String)
          You can check URLs in Best Buy API Documentation here

        • groovyx.net.http.HttpResponseDecorator getRecommendationsBySKU(long sku, java.lang.String endpoint, java.lang.String query = null, java.util.Map params = [:])

          Get Recommendations for a specific Product from API

          Returns:
          HttpResponseDecorator object with status & json data (if any)
          Parameters:
          sku - Product SKU to get recommendations for.
          endpoint - Recommendations endpoint to be requested (Check BBY documentation)
          query - to be added to request.
          params - Parameters to be added to request.

        • groovyx.net.http.HttpResponseDecorator getStores(java.lang.String storesQuery, java.lang.String productsQuery, java.util.Map params = [:])

          Get Stores list from API, providing a products Query

          Returns:
          HttpResponseDecorator object with status & json data (if any)
          Parameters:
          storesQuery - Stores query to be added to request.
          productsQuery - Products query to be added to request.
          params - Parameters to be added to request.
